actions_if_failed: If low: add motif pieces. If high: add structure & interaction.
definition: Percent of nonland cards that directly contribute to primary engine motifs/contracts.
how_to_compute: Count cards tagged as PRIMARY_ENGINE contributor / total nonland.
notes: Keeps decks coherent but not fragile.

actions_if_failed: If low: add role cards. If high: increase engine density.
definition: Percent of nonland cards that qualify as structural roles (ramp/draw/interaction/protection/board control/recursion).
how_to_compute: Count cards qualifying any structural role / total nonland (count each card once).

actions_if_failed: If high: swap narrow cards for role-compressed pieces.
definition: Probability-like score of drawing cards that do not advance engine or structure in average states.
how_to_compute: Sum weights of cards tagged as UTILITY_ONLY or NARROW_META without overlap; normalize by total.

actions_if_failed: If low: upgrade to multifunction cards.
definition: How many cards cover 2+ structural roles or engine+role at once.
how_to_compute: Count cards with role_count>=2 or (engine_contributor and role contributor) / total nonland.
notes: Higher density supports tighter lists and survivability.
